text: ++ prefix ++a Increment a by 1, then use the new value increment of a in the expression in which a resides. ++ postfix a++ Use the current value of a in the expression increment in which a resides, then increment a by 1. -- prefix --b Decrement b by 1, then use the new value decrement of b in the expression in which b resides. -- postfix b-- Use the current value of b in the expression decrement in which b resides, then decrement b by 1. Fig. 4.14 | Increment and decrement operators.
